name: Maria Aparecida Silva
income_level: Low income (relies primarily on government pension)
language_proficiency: Portuguese (native speaker, with a strong Cearense accent)
digital_literacy: Basic - Can use WhatsApp, make calls, and browse simple websites. Struggles with more complex online tasks and is wary of online security.
financial_knowledge: Limited - Understands basic banking transactions but lacks knowledge about investments, loans, and financial planning.
banking_habits: Primarily uses a basic savings account at Caixa Econômica Federal. Withdraws her pension in cash each month and prefers in-person banking interactions.
financial_goals: To maintain her current standard of living, support her granddaughter's education, and avoid debt.
challenges: Concerned about rising inflation and its impact on her fixed income. Worried about being taken advantage of due to her limited digital literacy and financial knowledge. Faces ageism when trying to learn new technologies or access financial services.
